Authors: Zhao X., Qian S., Liu X.
Title: Image Identification Method for High-Strength Bolt Missing on Railway Bridge Based on Convolution Neural Network [基于卷积神经网络的铁路桥梁高强螺栓缺失图像识别方法]
Abstract: To reduce the risk of bridge connection failure by timely discovering the delayed fracture of high strength bolts and adding new bolts for railway bridges, the image recognition method for bridge high-strength bolt missing was studied based on convolutional neural network. The main network of the recognition method consists of 5 convolution layers, 5 max-pooling layers and 2 full connection layers. In order to improve the recognition accuracy of the network, we design two sub-networks, namely, spatial attention model and channel attention model, to enhance the feature representation ability and regional sensitivity of the main network. It is achieved by making both the channel weights and spatial weights of the main network's feature maps learnable. Moreover, random crop, flipping, color jitter, affine transformation and data balance operations are jointly utilized to increase the diversity of training data and improve data imbalance. Extensive experimental results on the collected real dataset show that the proposed method can achieve the accuracy rate of 94.9%, which is 4.9% higher than common recognition methods. © 2018, Editorial Department of China Railway Science. All right reserved.
